title: Friday Night Lights (Intro)
lyrics:
[Intro]
Yeah
Almost, almost
Damn
Hey
[Verse]
So here we are
So here we are
So here we are
It's funny how so close can seem so far
Seem so far
Seem so far
Seem so far
Funny how so close can seem so far
I mean, nigga, this is your moment
Damn, this is your moment
Damn, this 'posed to be your moment, ain't it?
This 'posed to be your moment
This 'posed to be your moment
This 'posed to be your moment
What good is being the one when you the only one that knows it?
